entry.title: Rise of the Tomb Raiderâ„¢
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šHK$Â 228.00 â†’ HK$Â 199.00 ï¼‰

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Discover the legend within. Before you buy, please expand this description and check that your computer matches or exceeds each of the requirements listed. In the breathtaking sequel to Tomb Raider, Lara Croft becomes more than a survivor as she embarks upon her first great expedition to explore the earthâ€™s most ancient and remote regions and uncover the secret of immortality. Harness Laraâ€™s growing talents in a dramatic action-adventure ranging from Syriaâ€™s sun-baked ruins to Siberiaâ€™s frozen mountains. Play as the young archaeologist as she conquers tombs, outpaces rivals, and establishes her legend. THE COMPLETE ADVENTURE Rise of the Tomb Raider: 20 Year Celebration equips the base game with its entire collection of DLC. Uncover the secrets of Croft Manor in Blood Ties, find the truth behind a mythic terror in Baba Yaga: The Temple of the Witch, prevent a lethal outbreak in Cold Darkness, and face waves of supernatural enemies in Laraâ€™s Nightmare. In Endurance Mode, survive the harsh Siberian wilderness alone or co-operatively with another player. Important information regarding Rise of the Tomb Raider: The game is officially supported on the following Macs. To check your Mac model and when it was released, select About This Mac from the Apple menu on your menu bar. â—¦ All 13" MacBook Pros released since 2016 â—¦ All 15" MacBook Pros released since Late 2013 with a 2.3GHz processor or better â—¦ All 21.5" iMacs released since 2017 â—¦ All 27" iMacs released since Late 2013 (models with an Nvidia GT 755M graphics card are not officially supported) (1) â—¦ All Mac Pros released since Late 2013 (1) Late 2012 models with a 2GB Nvidia 680MX graphics card are also supported. The following Macs are capable of running the game but do not consistently meet the standards required for official support. â—¦ All 15" MacBook Pros released since Late 2013 â—¦ All 21.5" iMacs released since Late 2013 with a 2.3GHz processor or better (models with an Nvidia 750M graphics card are not supported). â€¢ Minimum System Requirements: â—¦ Processor: 2.3GHz â—¦ RAM: 8GB â—¦ Graphics: 1.5GB â—¦ macOS: 10.13.4 â—¦ Free Space: 36GB Check the Feral website for more detailed specifications. â€¢ If you require assistance, please contact our support team at support@feralinteractive.com â€¢ Supports over 100 different models of gamepad. For a full list check the Feral support site. â€¢ This game is not currently supported on volumes formatted as Case-sensitive. â€¢ You can find out more about the game on the Rise of the Tomb Raider mini-site at feralinteractive.com/riseofthetombraider RISE OF THE TOMB RAIDER Â© 2018 Square Enix Ltd. All Rights Reserved. RISE OF THE TOMB RAIDER, TOMB RAIDER, CRYSTAL DYNAMICS, the CRYSTAL DYNAMICS logo, EIDOS, the EIDOS logo and LARA CROFT are registered trademarks or trademarks of Square Enix Ltd. SQUARE ENIX and the SQUARE ENIX logo are registered trademarks or trademarks of Square Enix Holdings Co., Ltd. Developed for and published on macOS by Feral Interactive Ltd. Mac and macOS are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. Feral and the Feral logo are trademarks of Feral Interactive Ltd. All other marks are property of their respective owners. All rights reserved.

entry.title: Shadow of the Tomb Raider
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šHK$Â 428.00 â†’ HK$Â 279.00 ï¼‰

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Before you buy, please expand this description and check that your computer matches or exceeds each of the requirements listed. In the spectacular action-adventure puzzle game and thrilling finale to the Tomb Raider origins trilogy, Lara Croft must save the world from a Mayan apocalypse and shape her destiny to become the Tomb Raider. Important information regarding Shadow of the Tomb Raider: The game is officially supported on the following Macs. To check your Mac model and when it was released, select About This Mac from the Apple menu on your menu bar. â€¢ All 15â€ MacBook Pros released since Late 2016 â€¢ All 13â€ MacBook Pros released since 2016 â€¢ All Mac minis released since 2018 â€¢ All 21.5â€ iMacs released since 2017 â€¢ All 27â€ iMacs released since Late 2014 â€¢ All 27" iMac Pros released since Late 2017 â€¢ All Mac Pros released since Late 2013 The following Macs are capable of running the game but do not consistently meet the standards required for official support. â€¢ All 13" MacBook Airs released since 2018 â€¢ All 12" MacBooks released since Early 2016 â€¢ All Mac minis released since Late 2012 â€¢ All 21.5" iMacs released since Late 2015 with an Intel Iris Pro Graphics 6200 graphics card â€¢ Minimum System Requirements: â—¦ Processor: 2GHz â—¦ RAM: 8GB â—¦ Graphics: 1.5GB â—¦ macOS: 10.15 â—¦ Free Space: 40GB Check the Feral website for more detailed specifications. â€¢ This game is not currently supported on volumes formatted as Case-sensitive. SHADOW OF THE TOMB RAIDER Â© 2018, 2019 Square Enix Limited. Developed by Eidos Interactive Corporation. All rights reserved. SHADOW OF THE TOMB RAIDER, TOMB RAIDER, CRYSTAL DYNAMICS, the CRYSTAL DYNAMICS logo, EIDOS-MONTRÃ‰AL, the EIDOS-MONTRÃ‰AL logo, and LARA CROFT are registered trademarks or trademarks of Square Enix Limited.
